Site: The Angeles Crest
Base URL: https://theangelescrest.com/
Scope: Unofficial AC100 and San Gabriel Mountains trail running guides for runners, crew, and pacers in Southern California.

Authoritative content on this site:
- Editorial guidance, checklists, and route-planning notes published at theangelescrest.com.
- Page URLs, page structure, and internal links on this domain.
- AC100 context guides written from a SoCal training and logistics perspective.
- Official race rules, entry policies, and current closures are not authoritative here; confirm those with the official AC100 organization and relevant land managers.

Start here:
- Homepage: https://theangelescrest.com/
- Guides hub: https://theangelescrest.com/guides/
- AC100 overview: https://theangelescrest.com/ac100-guide.html
- AC100 qualifying hub: https://theangelescrest.com/ac100/qualifiers/50-milers/
- Solo playbook: https://theangelescrest.com/solo-playbook.html
- Gear page: https://theangelescrest.com/gear.html
- Route packs / GPX planning: https://theangelescrest.com/guides/san-gabriel-mountains-long-run-routes/ (no downloadable GPX files are currently published on this site)
